biotools.summary: mmsig is a tool for flexible and easily interpretable mutational signature analysis. mmsig was developed for hematological malignancies, but can be extended to any cancer with a well-known mutational signature landscape. mmsig is based on an expectation maximization algorithm for mutational signature fitting and applies cosine similarities for dynamic error suppression as well as bootstrapping-based confidence intervals and assessment of transcriptional strand bias.

bioschemas.name: mmsig
